sys_script_include.description: Returns the script contained in the given run server side script test step or the script of the first run server side test step script.
sys_script_include.name: SetTestStepScript

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_823a76149351e610959b7fda2bba1043
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_snc_ad.SetTestStepScript</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Returns the script contained in the given run server side script test step or the script of the first run server side test step script.</description><mobile_callable>false</mobile_callable><name>SetTestStepScript</name><sandbox_callable>false</sandbox_callable><script><![CDATA[function SetTestStepScript(vTestStep,strTestScript)
{
	var grTestStep = GetRecord('sys_atf_step',vTestStep);
	if (IsValidRecord(grTestStep) == false)
	{
		var grTest = GetRecord('sys_atf_test',vTestStep);
		if (IsValidRecord(grTest) == false)
		{
			return false;
		}	
		grTestStep = new GlideRecord('sys_atf_step');
		grTestStep.orderBy('order');
		grTestStep.addQuery('test','=',grTest.sys_id);
		grTestStep.addQuery('step_config','=','41de4a935332120028bc29cac2dc349a');
		grTestStep.setLimit(1);
		grTestStep.query();
		if (grTestStep.next() == false)
		{
			return false;
		}
	}
	
	var grVariable = new GlideRecord('sys_variable_value');
	grVariable.addQuery('document_key','=',grTestStep.sys_id);
	grVariable.addQuery('variable','=',
		AppGetProperty('atf.step_config.runserversidescript.variable.script'));
	grVariable.query();
	if (grVariable.next() == false)
	{
		return false;
	}
	var strTestCode = GetStringValue(grVariable.value);
	return strTestCode;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-04-30 08:20:33</sys_created_on><sys_id>823a76149351e610959b7fda2bba1043</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SetTestStepScript</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ArtificialDeveloper WORK IN PROGRESS" source="x_snc_ad">1cdc1a16c3919a105a37f90705013102</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="ArtificialDeveloper WORK IN PROGRESS">1cdc1a16c3919a105a37f90705013102</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_823a76149351e610959b7fda2bba1043</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-04-30 08:20:33</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
